Quickstrike:




Quickstrike turned his head, his eye following Dark Mouse as she passed. He 
was surprised that she hadn't reckonized him. He nearly risked his life her 
her. That ungrateful slag!

But he got thinking. Scorponok was the one in charge of reprograming her. He 
must of done it wrong. He should have done it himself, if it weren't for his 
legs.

"She's on-line," was the only thing he said, then turned his attention back 
to Black Arachnia. He managed a grin on his mouth plate to let her know.

He groaned as he heard Shredder insult him over his comm-link. He lowered 
his head and snarled back into it: "Don't argue, tin-horn. Megatron gave me 
th' position. Go t' him if ya got uh problem wit' it! But as far as ah'm 
concern'd, get out there! Ah gave ya uh job, now do it!"

He brought his head back up. He said to Black Arachnia, "Can't get no 
respect wit' these tin-horns. Think they're better than me."
